item.title: TWiGCPâ€Šâ€”â€Šâ€œGKE Autopilot, Databricks & MongoDB partnerships, and quite a bit moreâ€
item.dc:creator: Alexis MP
item.content:encoded:
TWiGCPâ€Šâ€”â€Šâ€œGKE Autopilot, Databricks & MongoDB partnerships, and quite a bitÂ moreâ€

Top GCP stories ğŸ“£ for this past week includeÂ :

  • Introducing GKE Autopilot: a revolution in managed Kubernetes (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Databricks, Google Cloud provide data, analytics and AI together (GoogleÂ blog)
  • MongoDB and Google Extend Partnership To Drive Enterprise Cloud Modernization (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Modernizing materialized views in BigQuery (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Introducing schedule-based autoscaling for Compute Engine (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Service Directory is GA and adds automatic service registration (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Introducing Cloud Domains (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Introducing GKE multi-cluster services (GoogleÂ blog)
  • BigQuery drives faster queries in popular BI tools with BI Engine (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Twitter @GoogleCloudTechâ€Šâ€”â€Šnew name, sameÂ crew

From the â€œkeeping things tidyâ€ departmentÂ :

  • Private Catalog for Google Cloud Marketplace supports Terraform (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Update Google Data Catalog Tags with Cloud Dataprep Metadata | by Victor Coustenoble (medium.com)

From the â€œunderstanding and using Googleâ€™s secret weaponâ€Šâ€”â€Šits networkâ€ departmentÂ :

  • Understanding Google Cloud network edge points (GoogleÂ blog)

From the â€œControlling costâ€ departmentÂ :

From the â€œParallelizing and extending Workflowsâ€ departmentÂ :

From the â€œCloud Run truly loves all programming languagesâ€ departmentÂ :

From the â€œDataprocâ€Šâ€”â€Šfrom a decision tree to data science at scaleâ€ departmentÂ :

From the â€œML models on Google Cloud, from convenient to high-performanceâ€ departmentÂ :

  • How to use a Machine Learning Model from a Google Sheet using BigQuery ML (GoogleÂ blog)

From the â€œmore projects, metrics, and retentionâ€œ departmentÂ :

  • Increasing limits for three Cloud Monitoring features (GoogleÂ blog)

From the â€œpractice GKE troubleshooting with a sample appâ€ departmentÂ :

  • How to find and resolve issues in your applications and infrastructure on GKE (GoogleÂ blog)

From our â€œever growing and rich community on Mediumâ€ departmentÂ :

  • Quickly Deploy Applications Using Terraform With Kubernetes on GCP | by MPL (medium.com)
  • Full relational diagram for Ethereum public data on Google BigQuery | by Rif Kiamil (medium.com)
  • Monitoring your Dataflow pipelines: an overview | by JÃ©rÃ©mie Gomez (medium.com)
  • Google Cloud Spanner: Stream Data from a Query to a Transaction in NodeJS | by Knut Olav LÃ¸ite (medium.com)

From the â€œArchitectural best practicesâ€ departmentÂ :

  • Framework for building a configuration driven data lake using Data Fusion and Composer (GoogleÂ blog)
  • Shifting left on security (cloud.google.com)
  • Designing multi-tenant architectures (cloud.google.com)
  • Managing cloud infrastructure using kpt (cloud.google.com)
  • A new Google Cloud VMware Engine networking whitepaper (GoogleÂ blog)

From the â€œcustomers and partners solving real-world problems with GCP ğŸ¤ â€ departmentÂ :

  • Why Sabre Corporation takes advantage of Prisma Cloud Compute gmon Google Cloud (GoogleÂ blog)

  • BBVA forms partnership with Google Cloud (cloud.google.com)

From the â€œğŸ”Š all things multimedia ğŸ¥â€ departmentÂ :

  • [YouTube] Introducing GKE Autopilot (youtube.com)
  • [YouTube] Secret Manager YouTube series (youtube.com)
  • [YouTube] How to choose the right database for application scalability (youtube.com)
  • [New Podcast] New Cloud Security Podcast by Google is here (cloud.google.com)
  • [Podcast] GCP Podcast Episode 247â€Šâ€”â€ŠCloud SQL Insights with Nimesh Bhagat (gcppodcast.com)
  • [Podcast] GCP Podcast Episode 248â€Šâ€”â€ŠCloud Spanner Revisited with Dilraj Kaur and Christoph Bussler (gcppodcast.com)
  • [Podcast] Kubernetes Podcast Episode 138â€” Multi-Cluster Services, with Jeremy Olmsted-Thompson (kubernetespodcast.com)
  • [Podcast] Kubernetes Podcast Episode 139â€” GKE Autopilot, with Yochay Kiriaty (kubernetespodcast.com)

From the â€œPreview, GA, or what?â€ departmentÂ :

  • [GA] Cloud SDKÂ 329.0.0
  • [GA] Hierarchical firewall policiesÂ overview
  • [GA] BigQuery materialized views
  • [GA] Cloud Composer support forÂ CMEK
  • [GA] Optimal Recommendations for Compute Engine committed use discounts

That is all for this week!
-Alexis
